basics.name: Vitaliia Bilaniuk
basics.label: Front-end developer
basics.summary: A result-driven Front-End Developer with 6 years of experience specializing in web development. A proven track record of collaborating cross-functionally with technical teams and stakeholders across all phases of the software development lifecycle. Passionate about learning and development. Eager to tackle more complex problems and continue to find ways to maximize user efficiency. Mainly worked with Angular but open to learn other frameworks and technologies.

work.summary: As a contractor, worked with Clickatell company team on two web-portals (admin and client portal) simultaneously, using Angular 8 and Angular 11.
highlights: - Developed complex dashboards on the admin portal using  Angular
- Implemented various components on client portal ( including payment and refund functionality, transaction history tables, account settings, subscriptions description pages, etc)
- Reimplemented legacy portal functionality using new technologies
- Configured and implemented Cybersource integration for 3D secure payments
- Worked with Power BI integration and charts displaying/configuration
- Upgraded application from Angular 8 to Angular 11
- Onboarded new team members and mentored them

work.summary: Developed the front-end of customers websites using HTML, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap
highlights: - Created various landing pages using HTML, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap
- Adjusted WordPress themes to customer's needs
- Created many static websites using Jekyll and hugo site generators

work.summary: Developed the front-end of customers websites using HTML, CSS3, jQuery, Bootstrap
I was responsible for the marketing strategy of the company, also leaded the development of company's website along with company's social networks
